Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back HOT EXCLUSIVE 2027 SAILING Asia Gems of Southeast Asia 19 Night Cruise Overview Inclusions Cabin Types Terms & Conditions This voyage highlights Southeast Asia at its most rewarding. This cruise carries you from Singapore to Hong Kong, with rich stops along the way. Bangkok offers a full overnight to enjoy its sights, while Vietnam adds depth with time in Ho Chi Minh City, Hue, and scenic Halong Bay. In Cambodia, relax in Sihanoukville before heading north. With multiple overnight stays, you’ll have more chances to linger, discover, and enjoy each destination at an unhurried pace. Cruise on Azamara Quest, your boutique hotel at sea, where practically everything is included and the atmosphere is laid-back. You can relax onboard on sun-drenched decks, in the refreshing pool, and revitalizing spa. There's never a dull moment onboard with celebrations, cultural performances, and cocktails! View more View less 19 Night Cruise from $ 7909 per person share twin Club Interior Cruising with Azamara Cruises HOT EXCLUSIVE 2027 SAILING Sale Period : until 28 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Departs 14 Mar 27 | sailing Singapore to Hong Kong Deal Inclusions 19 night cruise onboard Azamara Quest from Singapore to Hong Kong Azamara Cruises Onboard Inclusions Variety of Dining Venues & Room Service Beer, Wine, and Spirits All Day & Night Signature AzAmazing Evenings Unlimited Self-Service Laundry Tips & Gratuities Cruise itinerary Day 1: Singapore, Singapore Embarks 10:00PM on Mar 14 The site of the world's busiest port, Singapore offers everything from the Mustafa Centre (a 24-hour mall) and the nightlife on Mohamed Sultan Road to incredible food with Chinese, Malay and Indian influences. Day 2-3: At Sea At Sea Mar 15 - Mar 16 Spend the day sailing in style aboard your boutique hotel at sea. Indulge in a treatment at Sanctum Spa, stay ship shape with a class at our fitness center, or lounge the day away on our sunny pool deck.In the evening, savor inspired Italian cuisine at Aqualina, or relish in a classic steakhouse experience at Prime C. Plus, you’ll find plenty of exciting evening entertainment, from thrilling shows at Cabaret Lounge to intimate performances in the Living Room. Day 4: Ko Samui, Thailand Arrives 7:30AM on Mar 17 Departs 2:00PM on Mar 17 Lined with coconut palms and white sand beaches, the tropical island paradise of Ko Samui is perfect to escape and explore, gaze up at the Big Buddha, cool off in a waterfall and eat delicious Thai food. Day 5-6: Bangkok (Laem Chabang), Thailand Arrives 9:00AM on Mar 18 Departs 10:00PM on Mar 19 Laem Chabang is a bustling port city located on the eastern coast of Thailand. Primarily an industrial and economic hub, Laem Chabang is close to several popular tourist destinations and offers access to various local attractions such as beautiful beaches, golf courses, and cultural sites. Day 7: At Sea Mar 20 Spend the day sailing in style aboard your boutique hotel at sea. Indulge in a treatment at Sanctum Spa, stay ship shape with a class at our fitness center, or lounge the day away on our sunny pool deck.In the evening, savor inspired Italian cuisine at Aqualina, or relish in a classic steakhouse experience at Prime C. Plus, you’ll find plenty of exciting evening entertainment, from thrilling shows at Cabaret Lounge to intimate performances in the Living Room. Day 8: Sihanoukville, Cambodia Arrives 8:00AM on Mar 21 Departs 5:00PM on Mar 21 Sihanoukville was built in the late 1950s as Cambodia’s first and only deep-water port, and it now offers golden beaches, Ream National Park, and is the gateway to Phnom Phen and Siem Reap’s Angkor Wat. Day 9: At Sea Mar 22 Spend the day sailing in style aboard your boutique hotel at sea. Indulge in a treatment at Sanctum Spa, stay ship shape with a class at our fitness center, or lounge the day away on our sunny pool deck.In the evening, savor inspired Italian cuisine at Aqualina, or relish in a classic steakhouse experience at Prime C. Plus, you’ll find plenty of exciting evening entertainment, from thrilling shows at Cabaret Lounge to intimate performances in the Living Room. Day 10-12: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam Arrives 9:00AM on Mar 23 Departs 7:00AM on Mar 25 Still referred to as Saigon by many, Ho Chi Minh City has an energy all its own, where trendy restaurants, nightclubs, bustling markets and French colonial architecture mix with modern and Asian influences. Day 13: At Sea Mar 26 Spend the day sailing in style aboard your boutique hotel at sea. Indulge in a treatment at Sanctum Spa, stay ship shape with a class at our fitness center, or lounge the day away on our sunny pool deck.In the evening, savor inspired Italian cuisine at Aqualina, or relish in a classic steakhouse experience at Prime C. Plus, you’ll find plenty of exciting evening entertainment, from thrilling shows at Cabaret Lounge to intimate performances in the Living Room. Day 14: Hue (Da Nang), Vietnam Arrives 6:00AM on Mar 27 Departs 10:00PM on Mar 27 A contrast between the fortified citadel and monumental entry gates of Hue and the charming small town of Hoi An and its old quarter, Da Nang is also a take off point for visits to countryside villages. Day 15: At Sea Mar 28 Spend the day sailing in style aboard your boutique hotel at sea. Indulge in a treatment at Sanctum Spa, stay ship shape with a class at our fitness center, or lounge the day away on our sunny pool deck.In the evening, savor inspired Italian cuisine at Aqualina, or relish in a classic steakhouse experience at Prime C. Plus, you’ll find plenty of exciting evening entertainment, from thrilling shows at Cabaret Lounge to intimate performances in the Living Room. Day 16-17: Halong Bay, Vietnam Arrives 8:00AM on Mar 29 Departs 8:00PM on Mar 30 Explore the incredible beauty of Halong Bay, a UNESCO World Heritage site filled with thousands of limestone islets and caves, or travel to Hanoi for French colonial architecture, shopping and fantastic food. Day 18: At Sea Mar 31 Spend the day sailing in style aboard your boutique hotel at sea. Indulge in a treatment at Sanctum Spa, stay ship shape with a class at our fitness center, or lounge the day away on our sunny pool deck.In the evening, savor inspired Italian cuisine at Aqualina, or relish in a classic steakhouse experience at Prime C. Plus, you’ll find plenty of exciting evening entertainment, from thrilling shows at Cabaret Lounge to intimate performances in the Living Room. Day 19-20: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Arrives 8:00AM on Apr 01 Debarks on Apr 02 Hong Kong is neon lights, mountains and beaches, junk boats and yachts, street markets and high-end malls, and an unbelievable array of skyscrapers, all designed with the essential input of feng shui. Cabin Types Departs From Singapore from Auckland Club Interior Stateroom Two lower beds convertible to one Queen size bed. 40” flat-screen television. Refrigerator with mini-bar. Thermostat-controlled air conditioner. Direct-dial telephone with voice mail. Writing desk. In-room safe. Hand-held hairdryer. USB ports under bedside reading lamps. (158 square feet). Singapore Cruise from $7909 Per person based on share twin Save $7700 per couple Travel 14 Mar - 02 Apr 27 Club Oceanview Stateroom Two lower beds convertible to one Queen size bed, some staterooms feature sofa bed, 40” flat-screen TV, veranda, refrigerator with mini-bar, thermostat-controlled air conditioner, direct-dial telephone with voice mail, writing desk, in-room safe, and hand-held hairdryer. 170 square feet with picture window. Singapore Cruise from $8959 Per person based on share twin Save $8600 per couple Travel 14 Mar - 02 Apr 27 Club Veranda Stateroom The Club Veranda Stateroom on the Azamara Quest features a private veranda for uninterrupted ocean views. With two twin beds (convertible to a queen), a cozy sitting area, and modern amenities, it’s the perfect spot to unwind and enjoy the fresh sea air throughout your journey. Singapore Cruise from $13,845 Per person based on share twin Save $2000 per couple Travel 14 Mar - 02 Apr 27 Please note: Stateroom images and features are samples only. Actual furniture, fixtures, colors, configurations and window/porthole views may vary. Terms & Conditions All cruise packages are based on Twin share, inside cabin and costs are per person. Availability is current as at 03 Nov 25 and deals are available until date shown or until sold out. Space is strictly limited and is subject to availability at time of booking. On board credit where shown is per cabin & must be spent on board and is not refundable in cash. All passengers are bound by the individual cruise lines terms & conditions, please ask your consultant for a full copy. Current Deals must be paid in full at time of booking or deposit dates as shown. All passengers must have a valid passport with more than 6 months validity at the end of their holiday. Travel insurance should be taken out at time of booking to cover in the event of any unforeseen cancellation. Included airfares are based on special non refundable economy fares, ground transfers are not included unless specified, any hotels included are on a room only basis unless specified. Hotels in certain destinations in Europe, USA and Asia may require local tourist taxes or resort fees payable at check in, We aim to give an indication of these where possible, but unfortunately you cannot pre pay this aspect of the hotel rate and must settle at check in. ESTA Visas are required for Itineraries visiting USA ,Canada, India, China, Vietnam, Schengen states & Sri Lanka. Visa costs are not included. Passports must be valid at least 6 months after the end of your holiday, If travelling on a non NZ passport other visas + NZ re-entry permits may also be required, please check with applicable embassy. Passport validity, Visas, Vaccinations and health requirements are the responsibility of the passengers. Individual cruise line T&C will apply based on the cruise line booked. HOT CODE: CRUAZAPKG Not quite right? Let us help you find the perfect holiday or deal. Here’s how to get in touch...
